title: Caloundra One- & Two-Bedroom Apartments Steps from Kings Beach with Welcome Hamper
description:
Soak up life on the coast with a sleek apartment stay in Caloundra. With a location just moments from the iconic Kings Beach, you can dive into the oceanfront seawater pool, paddleboard into crisp waters and watch skydivers stick their landing nearby, all before retreating to your private, centrally-located one- or two-bedroom apartment.

This bustling resort town is a family favourite - discover a vibrant art scene, take a short drive to the famous Australia Zoo, spot whales on a boating expedition and hike along the scenic Caloundra Coastal Walk.

Onsite, there's plenty to keep you entertained. Go head-to-head in the arcade room with a game of street racer, swim laps of the outdoor pool and savour a sweat-sesh in the sauna.

title: Award-Winning Family Friendly Sunshine Coast Escape with Waterpark & Daily Breakfast
description:
There’s no shortage of beachside family fun at Oaks Sunshine Coast Oasis Resort, located just a short stroll from bustling Bulcock and Golden Beach’s sensational shores. Awarded the Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award in 2023 and consistently voted one of Australia’s best family-friendly resorts, this stay is a slam dunk for couples and families alike. Upgrade to the Executive Family Room for two adults and two children and enjoy days spent exploring the resort’s incredible facilities - including a shimmering outdoor pool, putt-putt golf course and giant Kangaroo Jumper - plus receive complimentary access to the onsite children's waterpark. You’ll be all set to make a splash.

Ready to explore? Caloundra’s six spectacular beaches, barbecue-filled parklands and coastal bushwalks all await. Drive just half an hour to reach Australia Zoo, on Steve Irwin Way, and the country's largest go-kart track. Return to the resort's onsite restaurant, Oak & Vine Sunshine Coast, for wood-fired pizzas and the perfect drop of wine at sunset on the restaurant's deck, surrounded by lush gardens and the resort's pool.

title: Award-Winning Family-Friendly Sunshine Coast Escape with Waterpark & Daily Breakfast
description:
There’s no shortage of beachside family fun just a short stroll from bustling Bulcock and Golden Beach’s sensational shores. Crowned one of Australia's Best Family Resorts by Holiday with Kids, this family-friendly stay is a slam dunk for couples and families alike.

Ready to explore? Caloundra’s six spectacular beaches, barbecue-filled parklands and coastal bushwalks all await. title: Relaxed Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Apartment Stay with Lagoon Pool
description: Gather friends and family and escape to the Sunshine Coast with a relaxing stay just moments from the sands of Bulcock Beach. Ideally located in the heart of Caloundra, this modern retreat is a stone's throw from the town's vibrant dining and shopping precinct, and only a 30-minute drive from Australia Zoo. Enjoy the convenience of self-contained apartment living together with a glittering lagoon pool and space to cook up a barbecue feast.

title: Fun-Filled Sunshine Coast Escape with Waterpark & Mini-Golf Course
description: The whole family or a group of friends can enjoy an escape brimming with extra-special, fun in the sun moments when staying at Oaks Sunshine Coast Oasis Resort. Incredible facilities include an exciting onsite waterpark, large outdoor swimming pool, mini-golf golf course, sandpit, climbing frame and giant Kangaroo Jumper - there's something for all ages. The Oak & Vine Sunshine Coast restaurant is a popular eatery for Caloundra locals or visitors and is perfect for a tasty meal along the waterfront or a glass of wine on the deck.
